We employ eco-friendly practices  at our leased distribution centers in  
Riverside, California, and Charlotte, North Carolina.
Cardboard and pallets 
reused for multiple 
shipments
Energy efficient bulbs and 
natural light used through -
out the warehouse 
Electric forklifts 
used for loading 
and unloading
Electronic scanners 
utilized to reduce 
paper use
